definition: Dufour gland (produces female sex hormone in bees)

sentences.english: A soft yellow wax secreted by glands in the ear canal.
sentences.chinese: 一种由耳道腺体分泌的黄色软质的蜡状分泌物。

sentences.english: You may get a rash and swollen glands.
sentences.chinese: 你可以出疹子和腺体肿胀。

sentences.english: C5- Vocal cords, neck glands, pharynx.
Cyst density and mammary gland gland similar or slightly compact.
sentences.chinese: 囊肿的密度与乳腺腺体相似或稍致密。

sentences.english: The glands in ear canals are producing too much wax in some people. Earwax is usually expelled.
sentences.chinese: 有些人耳道中的腺体分泌过多的腊质物体。

sentences.english: The lymphatic system is a network of tubes, glands and organs.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴系统是一个网络的管，腺体和器官。

sentences.english: The parotid gland undergoing partial parotidectomy does have the ability of regeneration.
sentences.chinese: 行部分腺体切除术后的腮腺确有再生的能力。

sentences.english: Hormones are chemicals produced by your body's glands.
sentences.chinese: 荷尔蒙是你身体腺体分泌出的一种化学物质。

sentences.english: The glands are well-differentiated and still have some intervening stroma.
sentences.chinese: 分化较好的腺体间有间质分布。

sentences.english: The seminal vesicle functions as a gland, secreting and storing the viscid component of the seminal fluid.
sentences.chinese: 精囊腺作为一个腺体发挥功能，分泌和储存精囊液。

sentences.english: Rubella causes a rash and swollen glands.
sentences.chinese: 风疹引起皮疹和腺体肿胀。

sentences.english: Conclusion The floating cultural model of HNG was successfully established.
sentences.chinese: 结论成功地建立了人鼻粘膜腺体细胞的悬浮培养模型。

sentences.english: Snap-In Wipers are designed to fit in standard wiper glands.
sentences.chinese: 管理单元刮水器设计，以适应在标准雨刮腺体。

sentences.english: The stipules are sometimes reduced to glands.
sentences.chinese: 具托叶，有时呈腺体状或无。

sentences.english: The prostate is a gland, weighing 25 gram, below the bladder.
sentences.chinese: 前列腺是一个重25克的腺体，位于膀胱下方。

sentences.english: At higher magnification, the enlarged prostate has glandular hyperplasia.
sentences.chinese: 高倍镜示增生前列腺的腺体增生。

definition: endocrine gland/gland producing internal secretion, e.g. hormone
